title: Vimcar
description: Vimcar has quickly grown to be a surprising success story within the multi-billion-dollar connected car industry. The startup’s flagship product, a mileage tracking application, has already helped over 5.000 companies to save thousands in taxes. But even bigger plans are ahead: Vimcar’s mission is to digitise and automate every aspect of fleet management for small to medium-size businesses, which in many cases don’t have a human fleet manager of their own. #auto #car #startup
